name: Hizzmet.com
tag_list: turkish-marketplace, ecommerce, teklif, borsa, bidding, tender, service, turkey, internet-in-turkey, turkish-internet-market, turkish-internet-companies, remodelling, dekorasyon, boya, tadilat, badana, temizlik, kuru-temizleme, ihale, moda
overview: For consumer, Hizzmet.com is a platform where consumers who need a service performed to find and interact with local businesses and professionals. Also, it is an online marketplace that helps people live smarter by allowing them to outsource their tasks. For businesses, Hizzmet.com is a platform where business owners get free marketing tools and leads to gain more customers. Additionally, Hizzmet.com is a marketplace which connects people who do not have enough time (professionals, business or ordinary people who need urgent help etc.) to people who have spare time (university students, unemployed professionals, underemployed professionals etc). Consumers describe what they need done and specify when and where their job should take place. The screened & approved service provider who makes the fastest bid will automatically be assigned to run the consumer’s task. If consumers decides to reject the service provider’s bid, another service provider will be assigned to run consumer’s task based on insights on the rejection. Consumers can view the business profiles, ratings and reviews from past Hizzmet.com consumers.
